summary: At a Malibu rented house, a tennis hustler, a surfer and a musician enjoy a Bohemian lifestyle, fall in-love with an unexpected female visitor and fight off a motorcycle punk gang.
cast: Anthony Franciosa|Michael Sarrazin|Jacqueline Bisset|Bob Denver|Michael Wilding|Michele Carey|Lara Lindsay|Norma Crane|Percy Rodrigues|Warren Stevens|Pat Buttram|Michael Forest|Lloyd Gough|Stacy King|Corinna Tsopei|Charles Dierkop|Arthur Franz|Mikel Angel|Nyles Brown|Seymour Cassel|Marc Cavell|Sam Chew Jr.|John Cliff|Paul Condylis|Mickey Dora|Linda Gamble|Moby Grape|Lee Hazlewood|John Holmes|Wesley Lau|Ralph Lee|Larry Linville|Stephan Merjanian|William O'Connell|Lou Procopio
title: La playa
